articles.title: King Charles III will be 'ruthless' if Harry and Meghan continue 'unfair attacks' - Express
articles.description: The date for King Charles III's coronation has been set, but it remains unclear if Prince Harry will return for the ceremony.

articles.author: Beth Hale
articles.title: Angela Lansbury's proudest role - rescuing her daughter from Charles Manson's evil clutches - Daily Mail
articles.description: If any Hollywood star projected maternal warmth, it was Dame Angela Lansbury, who died this week aged 96. It's almost unimaginable she was forced to confront the terrible horrors at home.
articles.content:
Her eyes seemed to be permanently twinkling, while her voice radiated a fireside cosiness. If any Hollywood star projected maternal warmth, it was Dame Angela Lansbury, who died this week aged 96.

articles.title: Star of Netflix's The Crown takes plunge as series recreates Princess Diana's last holiday - Daily Mail
articles.description: Perched on the end of a diving board alone with her thoughts, it is one of the last photos taken of Princess Diana before her death.
articles.content:
